Key Match Events: Pakistan chased 205 to keep their semi-final hopes alive.
Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 23 runs.
Mohammad Wasim took 3 wickets for 31 runs.
Haris Rauf took 2 wickets for 36 runs.
Liton Das added 45 runs and Shakib Al Hasan scored 43 runs for Bangladesh.
Pakistan won by seven wickets, eliminating Bangladesh from the tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan expressed disappointment with their batting and bowling performance.
Pakistan captain Babar Azam congratulated his team for their performance and expressed confidence in winning the next two matches.
Player of the match Fakhar Zaman reflected on his practice and performance, aiming to score big in the next game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan boosted their net run-rate with the manner in which they chased the total down.
Bangladesh became the first team to be officially eliminated from the tournament.
